name: w3emc

conflicts.name: +extradeps+shared
conflicts.description: w3emc: Shared library cannot be built with unknown dependencies

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: generator
variants.description: the build system generator to use

variants.name: extradeps
variants.description: Build w3emc with subprograms which call unknown dependencies

description:
This library contains Fortran 90 decoder/encoder routines for GRIB
edition 1 with EMC changes. This is part of the NCEPLIBS project.

dependencies.name: bacio
dependencies.description:
The bacio ibrary performs binary I/O for the NCEP models, processing
unformatted byte-addressable data records, and transforming the little
endian files and big endian files.

dependencies.name: bufr
dependencies.description:
The NOAA bufr library contains subroutines, functions and other
utilities that can be used to read (decode) and write (encode) data in
BUFR, which is a WMO standard format for the exchange of meteorological
data. This is part of the NCEPLIBS project. The library also includes a
Python interface.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: nemsio
dependencies.description:
The NOAA Environmental Modeling System I/O (NEMSIO) library. The basic
functions it provides are to read and write data sets for all the NEMS
applications. This is part of NOAA's NCEPLIBS project.

dependencies.name: netcdf-fortran
dependencies.description:
NetCDF (network Common Data Form) is a set of software libraries and
machine-independent data formats that support the creation, access, and
sharing of array-oriented scientific data. This is the Fortran
distribution.

dependencies.name: ninja
dependencies.description:
Ninja is a small build system with a focus on speed. It differs from
other build systems in two major respects: it is designed to have its
input files generated by a higher-level build system, and it is designed
to run builds as fast as possible.

dependencies.name: sigio
dependencies.description:
The SIGIO library provides an Application Program Interface for
performing I/O on the sigma restart file of the NOAA global spectral
model. This is part of the NCEPLIBS project.

dependent_to.name: nemsio
dependent_to.description:
The NOAA Environmental Modeling System I/O (NEMSIO) library. The basic
functions it provides are to read and write data sets for all the NEMS
applications. This is part of NOAA's NCEPLIBS project.

dependent_to.name: ufs-utils
dependent_to.description:
The UFS Utilities package contains programs set up the model grid and
create coldstart initial conditions. This is related to NOAA's NCEPLIBS
project.

dependent_to.name: prod-util
dependent_to.description:
Product utilities for the NCEP models. This is part of NOAA's NCEPLIBS
project.

dependent_to.name: grib-util
dependent_to.description:
This is a collection of NCEP GRIB related utilities. This is related to
NOAA's NCEPLIBS project.

dependent_to.name: ufs-weather-model
dependent_to.description:
The Unified Forecast System (UFS) Weather Model (WM) is a prognostic
model that can be used for short- and medium-range research and
operational forecasts, as exemplified by its use in the operational
Global Forecast System (GFS) of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric
Administration (NOAA).

dependent_to.name: g2
dependent_to.description:
Utilities for coding/decoding GRIB2 messages. This library contains
Fortran 90 decoder/encoder routines for GRIB edition 2, as well as
indexing/searching utility routines. This is part of the NCEPLIBS
project.
